title: America has been 'piggy bank' for other countries: Trump
text:
America has been 'piggy bank' for other countries: Trump Tuesday, February 13, 2018 - 00:56 
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he was considering a range of options to address steel and aluminum imports that he said were unfairly hurting U.S. producers, including tariffs and quotas. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
